name: Green Monk: Diner Dash
description:
Diner Themed Idle Clicker game where you:

Click to Generate Ingredients, Use the ingredients to make Dishes, Buy Chefs for Dish and Ingredient Prep Automation and Prestige, earning yourself a trophy at different levels of achievement (Prestiges 1, 50, 100 which the first is hard to get to, let alone the latter 2)

Simple, Unadulterated Fun!!!

Credits:

Ethan Hartup aka Crazedslaw / Lynxy (UP2024961) - Programming and Compliation

Rhianna Pett aka Shimarisu (UP2066678) - Artwork and Idea Planning
